```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(scales)
library(xtable)
library(broom)
```

```{r}
d = read_csv('../data/norming/compiled-variance-entropy-glasgowRatings.csv') 
```
```{r}
filteredData = d %>%
  filter(imageability != 'N/A') %>%
  mutate(imageability = as.numeric(imageability),
         concreteness = as.numeric(concreteness))
```

```{r}
var = filteredData$variance
entp = filteredData$entropy
scatter.smooth(x=var, y=entp, cex=0.5)
text(var, entp+0.1, label=words, cex=0.5)
```
